text: On Monday @PRCLeicester welcomed MP @ASollowayUK to join their latest #Covid19 #vaccine trial. Our #NIHRprcs have increased the UK's capacity to deliver late-phase commercial research - including COVID19 vaccine trials - at pace and scale.
